name: maxbot
description: MaxBot - A customizable Twitch chat bot

scripts.start: concurrently "cd bot-server && npm start" "cd bot-client && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd bot-server && npm run dev" "cd bot-client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd bot-server && npm install && cd ../bot-client && npm install
